content.description: Sit start in the middle of the front face of The Arborist in sharp crack pockets. Make a big move up to a large horizontal crack jug and then make another big move out left to a good edge below the lip. Top out on decent holds. The large tree makes the mantle difficult.
content.location: Sit start in the middle of the front face of The Arborist (the side facing Crash Site).

content.description: Sit start on the backside of The Arborist on the overhung looking face. Go straight up and top out.
content.location: From Ace Arborist and the front face of The Arborist, move left around to the back of the boulder. You will come to Stay Packed first.

content.description: Kind of a silly slab problem on a small lump behind the main Arborist boulder. The beta is straight forward, do it with bare feet if you wish.
content.location: Stand starts on a small slab behind the main Arborist boulder in the middle of the face.

content.description: Stand start to the left of Stay Packed on a rather mossy looking arete. Work up the arete to top out on good holds.
content.location: Stand start on the backside of The Arborist (the side facing away from Crash Site) on the left-hand arete.

content.description: Sit start low a couple of feet to the left of Tree Hugger on a decent flake edge. Make a big move up left to a crack pocket and then grab a precarious-looking chunk of rock wedged into the crack. Finish using the same edge below the lip as Tree Hugger and then top out the same.
content.location: Sit start low a couple of feet to the left of Tree Hugger on the front face of The Arborist.

content.description: Situated directly behind Crash Site and slightly to the left, The Arborist features some easy and moderate climbing on good quality rock.
